extension.summary: Ask if you're still watching during binge playback
extension.description:
The Playback Watcher helps prevent endless playback during binge watching. After a configurable number of episodes, a prompt appears asking if you are still watching. Playback is paused while the prompt is shown. You can: - Continue watching - Stop playback - Snooze the prompt for a set time
If the prompt is ignored, playback can automatically stop.
